T02D2097:93b-1: dzny'a na satva manydzu shr'i na bi ma la ratna mu dra bi dhi n'a ma /
T02D2097:93b-3: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i rin po che'i phyag
T02D2097:93b-4: rgya dri ma med pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba
T02D2097:93b-5: / 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2097:93b-6: bdag blo yangs ldan cho ga rdzogs pa dang //
T02D2097:93b-7: drin ldan ma nyes gshin byang chub sems dpa' des //
T02D2097:93b-8: rtsod dus rkyen dbang shes rab nyam chung la //
T02D2097:93b-9: rgyud kyi rin chen phyag rgya btud de bshad //
T02D2097:93b-10: snying rje che dang chen por ldan //
T02D2097:93b-11: brtse bas don byed skyo ba med //
T02D2097:93b-12: spobs pa che zhing phan blor ldan //
T02D2097:93b-13: ngang tshul bzang zhing skyo bar bzod //
T02D2097:93b-14: shes rab che zhing nus pa yod //
T02D2097:94a-1: dang tshig gi sbyor sdeb mkhas //
T02D2097:94a-2: dpa' zhid rtul phod brtson 'grus che //
T02D2097:94a-3: bkas bsgo ba la drid mi 'jog / dad dang shes rab gtso bor gnas //
T02D2097:94a-4: bla ma'i brgyud thabs srog bzhin srung //
T02D2097:94a-5: yid la mi byed don bstan na //
T02D2097:94a-6: padma'i mdangs 'phro gnas las ldog / dam tshig gsum ni mig bzhin du ;
T02D2097:94a-7: / srung byed rin chen phyag rgya'i snod //
T02D2097:94a-8: de la 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan thos
T02D2097:94a-9: pa tsam gyis yid la mos par 'gyur ba'i skyes
T02D2097:94a-10: bu des ni grub pa'i tshegs chung dus bdag gis
T02D2097:94a-12: de yang bsam gtan gyi khang par yid du 'ong
T02D2097:94a-13: ba'i ras ris kyi mdun du glegs bam rab tu
T02D2097:94a-14: gnas par byas te bzhag la /
T02D2097:94a-15: de dang nye bar tsandan dkar pos byugs pa'i mandal
T02D2097:94a-16: khru gang ba grub bzhi pa'i steng du me tog
T02D2097:94a-19: me tog dkar po snyim pa gang thogs te /
T02D2097:94a-20: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2097:94a-21: ye shes sems dpa' chen po mchog nyid la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2097:94a-22: mtshan gyi 'khor lo thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2097:94a-23: bdag gi rnam par shes pa'i tshogs thams cad dang
T02D2097:94a-24: yang dag pa'i don gyi rnal 'byor du mdzad du
T02D2097:94a-25: gsol zhes lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu brjod la
T02D2097:94a-26: / me tog dkar po'i phred ba mgo la bcings te /
T02D2097:94a-28: til mar la bdar ba'i chu mig la byugs la /
T02D2097:94a-29: rmi lam brtag pa'i ltas kyang shes par bya'o //
T02D2097:94a-30: de nas tho rangs ci rigs pa'i rnal 'byor du gnas te /
T02D2097:94a-31: slob ma rtags dang rmi lam gyis shes par yo
T02D2097:94a-32: byad kyis spras nas nye ba dang lha'i mandal dang
T02D2097:94a-33: / sems bskyed pa rin po che'i phyag rgya'i yon phul te /
T02D2097:94a-34: tshul dang mthun pa'i gnas la /
T02D2097:94a-35: aom kye kye kye ye shes sems dang zhi ba rab mdzes sku //
T02D2097:94a-36: khyod thugs bskyed pa 'gro la sman pa'i gtso //
T02D2097:94a-37: 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas gti mug dral mdzad cing //
T02D2097:94a-38: me long lta bu'i mtshan bstod thugs chud ltar //
T02D2097:94a-39: sems bskyed la mos bde gshegs rigs 'gyur dag /'gro ba rnams kyi sku yi gdul bya'i phyir //
T02D2097:94a-40: bde gshegs rigs kyi sems bskyed gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2097:94a-41: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bdag byin brlab tu gsol //
T02D2097:94a-42: zhes lan gsum dang gsum gsum du brjod pa ni
T02D2097:94b-0: dbang po dang shes pa'i bye brag gis shes @94b
T02D2097:94b-1: par bya'o // phyag rgya'i bye brag ni man ngag gis so //
T02D2097:94b-2: de nas tshes gcig nas nye bar bzung ste /
T02D2097:94b-3: rnal 'byor bas rang gi spyod ba bcu la zhugs nas /
T02D2097:94b-4: lha'i bsgrub pa ldan pa'i mchan yang dag par brjod pa'i bsnyen pa ji srid spro'i par bya'o //
T02D2097:94b-5: thun mtshams dang glo bur gyi las ni mkhas pa dag gis ci rigs par sbyar ro //
T02D2097:94b-10: bram ze sgo ba dang grong du 'jug pa dang /
T02D2097:94b-11: don gnyer ba la sogs pa'i tshogs na gnas pa
T02D2097:94b-12: rnams kyis ni dran pa gcig pa'i byin gyis brlabs
T02D2097:94b-13: pa tsam la ci rigs bas bstod de /
T02D2097:94b-14: bdag dang 'gro ba sbyang tsam bya'o //
T02D2097:94b-15: tshe la sogs pa'i sbyor ba 'phel ba dang //
T02D2097:94b-16: 'dir gsungs yon tan rnams ni 'grub par 'gyur //
T02D2097:94b-17: lha dang mi yi mchog gyur gtso bo bzhin //
T02D2097:94b-18: lo ka dag las lhag pa'i gnas su 'gro //
T02D2097:94b-19: mun nag mthug po dag gis dkris pa rnams //
T02D2097:94b-20: zad 'gyur dri ma med pa'i 'od zer spung //
T02D2097:94b-21: padma'i rtsa bar rtsi yis mchog gnas gang //
T02D2097:94b-22: gha tra shing gi 'dab mas len bzhin du //
T02D2097:94b-23: bskal pa'i grangs la rag las mi 'gyur bar //
T02D2097:94b-24: mi yi tshe 'di nyid kyis 'dod bzhin thob //
T02D2097:94b-25: yang dag mtshan 'di'i sgo la dad pa gang //
T02D2097:94b-26: de yi mtshams med lnga yang skad cig des //
T02D2097:94b-27: dag na 'don dang klog pa smos ci dgos //
T02D2097:94b-28: ri khrod mgon po las thob pa'i //
T02D2097:94b-29: rgyud kyi rin chen phyag rgya 'di //
T02D2097:94b-31: skye ba'i rim 'byung byams pas byas //
T02D2097:94b-32: rigs gang rigs kyi lha las ni //
T02D2097:94b-33: dngos grub thogs med thob gyur cig / nam mkhas gar khyab lo ka 'gro ba rnams /
T02D2097:94b-34: ma rig phyag rgyas rab tu bcings gyur pa //
T02D2097:94b-35: blo gros chen po'i phyag rgyas bcad nas kyang //
T02D2097:94b-36: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i zhabs grub shog /'phags
T02D2097:94b-37: pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' rin po che'i
T02D2097:94b-38: phyag rgya dri ma med pa'i cho ga zhes bya
T02D2097:94b-39: ba rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su
T02D2097:94b-40: med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
